blocks.data:
Get sites linked to a [headless storefront](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/storefronts/developers-guide-headless) sales channels.

- [Authorization](#authorization)
- [Request Parameters](#request-parameters)
- [Responses](#responses)
- [Send a Test Request](#send-a-test-request)

```http
GET https://api.bigcommerce.com/stores/{{STORE_HASH}}/v3/sites
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {{ACCESS_TOKEN}}
```

|Header|Description|
|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|An [OAuth](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication/rest-api-authentication) `access_token`|

### [OAuth Scopes](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication/rest-api-authentication#oauth-scopes)

|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Channel Listings | modify | `store_channel_listings` |
|  Channel Listings | read-only | `store_channel_listings_read_only` |
|  Channel Settings | modify | `store_channel_settings` |
|  Channel Settings | read-only | `store_channel_settings_read_only` |
|  Sites & Routes | modify | `store_sites` |
|  Sites & Routes | read-only | `store_sites_read_only` |
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

page.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of items.

limit.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of items.

url.description: The Fully Qualified URL (including host and scheme) where this site is hosted. All URLs generated for this site will be appended to this.

channel_id.description: The channel this site is attached to. Each site belongs to a single channel, and each channel can have either zero or one sites.

created_at.description: When was this site created? RFC 3339

updated_at.description: When was this site defintion last updated? RFC 3339

routes.description: (optional - if included) collection of routes defined for this site. Limited to 200 routes side loaded (query routes direction via `/routes` for bulk)

id.description: Unique ID for this route. Required when updating an existing route.

type.description: The type of resource being routed to; [supported types](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-reference/cart-checkout/sites-routes-api#route-types).

matching.description:
Depending on the resource type, this can be an ID (matching a specific item), or a "*" wildcard (matching all items of that type).

For example, a route with a type: "product" and matching: "5" will be used for the product with the ID of 5.

route.description:
The route template that will be used to generate the URL for the requested resource.

Supports several tokens:
- `{id}` The **ID** of the requested item
- `{slug}` The **slug** for the requested item (if available). Note: the `slug` value may contain `/` slash
- `{language}` The **language** string that the client is using

count.description: Number of items returned on per page.

per_page.description: Number of items to be displayed per page.

previous.description: Query string appended to the resource to return to the previous page.

next.description: Query string appended to the resource to proceed to the next page.

current.description: Query string appended to the resource to show the current page.
